# w3ag

> Web3 Accessibility Guidelines (W3AG) is the first open standard for making blockchain, DeFi, and crypto applications accessible to people with disabilities. Covers wallet UX, transaction signing, address readability, and more.

## Overview

w3ag is an open-source project by nirholas. Web3 Accessibility Guidelines (W3AG) is the first open standard for making blockchain, DeFi, and crypto applications accessible to people with disabilities. Covers wallet UX, transaction signing, address readability, and more.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/w3ag
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
